mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN o.OrderStatus=0 AND FinishTime IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CancelCan, CASE WHEN o.OrderStatus=1 AND FinishTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsComplete, CASE WHEN o.OrderStatus=2 OR o.OrderStatus=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsCancle, OrderNo, TaskId FROM dbo.[Order] AS o WHERE o.id=${orderId} AND ClienterId=${userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE dbo.[Order] SET OrderStatus=2, CancelTime=GETDATE(), CancelName='${userId}', CancelRemark=(SELECT ClienterName FROM dbo.Clienter AS c WHERE c.id=${userId}) WHERE id=${orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN (o.OrderStatus=0 AND FinishTime IS NULL AND DATEADD(HOUR,rrt.TaskCycle,rrt.EndTime)>GETDATE() AND rrt.Status=1) OR (o.OrderStatus=1 AND o.AuditStatus=3 AND (rrt.Status=1 OR rrt.Status=3) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS SubmitCan,--1 可以提交 CASE WHEN o.OrderStatus=2 OR o.OrderStatus=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsCancel,-- 1订单已经取消 CASE WHEN (GETDATE()>rrt.EndTime AND FinishTime IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS TaskClosed,--任务已经关闭 不可提交 CASE WHEN o.OrderStatus=1 AND o.AuditStatus=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ReSubmit,--已经提交 等待审核 CASE WHEN (o.OrderStatus=1 AND o.AuditStatus=3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsAgainSubmit FROM dbo.[Order] AS o INNER JOIN dbo.RenRenTask AS rrt ON o .TaskId=rrt.id WHERE o.id=${orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE dbo.[Order] SET OrderStatus = 1 , AuditStatus=0, FinishTime = CASE WHEN FinishTime IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE FinishTime END WHERE id = ${orderId}
